short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Steven Universe wallpaper turn new tab to HD custom Steven Universe background. Steven Universe wallpaper theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Steven Universe wallpapers each time you open a new tab.
2. Randomize the Steven Universe background or mark favorites using the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google-powered search bar.
4. Quick links to your email and social media accounts.
5. Displays current date and time automatically.
6. Built-in notepad for jotting down tasks and reminders.
7. Easy access to your most frequently visited websites.
8. Convenient access to your bookmarks.
9. Add websites to a shortcut panel for instant access.
10. Quick links to Google apps.
11. Direct access to explore more themes.
12. Seamless sharing to social media platforms.
13. One-click download for wallpapers.
14. Quick access to play online games.
15. Activate fun animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks on the Steven Universe  new tab.
